Quote: MagicSandraâ€™s seen a leprechaun,Eddie touched a troll,Laurie danced with witches once,Charlie found some goblins gold.Donald heard a mermaid sing,Susy spied an elf,But all the magic I have knownI've had to make myself.
Author: Shel Silverstein,  Where the Sidewalk Ends: The Poems and Drawings of Shel Silverstein
